metadata.title: CVE-2024-42081 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  drm/xe/xe_devcoredump: Check NULL before assignments  Assign 'xe_devcoredump_snapshot *' and 'xe_device *' only if 'coredump' is not NULL.  v2 - Fix commit messages.  v3 - Define variables before code.(Ashutosh/Jose)  v4 - Drop return check for coredump_to_xe. (Jose/Rodrigo)  v5 - Modify misleading commit message. (Matt)
